description.text: Perfect for a pinkie, this is the same skull design as the small skull necklace, cast in recycled sterling silver and made to your measurements.
If you aren't sure about which size you need, you can order a ring sizer to get your measurements.

image.alt: A small simple skull face on the front of a silver band, worn on a flower petal like a ring

mobile.alt: A small simple skull face on the front of a silver band, worn on a flower petal like a ring

thumbnail.alt: A small simple skull face on the front of a silver band, worn on a flower petal like a ring

alt_text.text: a small skull on a silver band, worn on the little finger

description.text: This small sterling silver anatomical heart is carved and finished by hand.  Cast in solid recycled silver, this tiny heart has anatomical detail and a high shine finish.  Strung on a recycled 925 silver chain in your choice of length.

image.alt: A close up photo of a small silver anatomical heart on a silver chain, laid on a petal.

mobile.alt: A close up photo of a small silver anatomical heart on a silver chain, laid on a petal.

thumbnail.alt: A close up photo of a small silver anatomical heart on a silver chain, laid on a petal.

description.text: This silver plated enamel pin is designed by The Black Hart, made in an ethical factory and shipped using all recyclable materials.

image.alt: An enamel pin in he image of a white hand with a black snake curled around it, where the lines around each element are made from silver metal.

mobile.alt: An enamel pin in he image of a white hand with a black snake curled around it, where the lines around each element are made from silver metal.

thumbnail.alt: An enamel pin in he image of a white hand with a black snake curled around it, where the lines around each element are made from silver metal.

description.text: This large anatomical skull ring is cast from solid recycled silver. With only an upper jaw, the details on this ring include cracks and aged eye sockets. Each one is unique and hand made to order.

image.alt: A large skull with no lower jaw made from silver sits on the front of the ring. The skull has blackened carved details of deep eye sockets, nose crevice and teeth, as well as some cracking details on the sides of the skull.

mobile.alt: A large skull with no lower jaw made from silver sits on the front of the ring. The skull has blackened carved details of deep eye sockets, nose crevice and teeth, as well as some cracking details on the sides of the skull.

thumbnail.alt: A large skull with no lower jaw made from silver sits on the front of the ring. The skull has blackened carved details of deep eye sockets, nose crevice and teeth, as well as some cracking details on the sides of the skull.

description.text: This multisizer is a simple way to find your ring size. You can see how to do this here.

image.alt: A hand holds up a thin strip of plastic with the word SIZE on followed by incremental measurement marks and the alphabet denoting ring sizes. In the background is a pink flower

mobile.alt: A hand holds up a thin strip of plastic with the word SIZE on followed by incremental measurement marks and the alphabet denoting ring sizes. In the background is a pink flower

thumbnail.alt: A hand holds up a thin strip of plastic with the word SIZE on followed by incremental measurement marks and the alphabet denoting ring sizes. In the background is a pink flower

description.text: The miniature skull designs, together as one. These hand carved skulls are all slightly different, so your matching set will be unique to you. Cast in solid recycled sterling silver and on a sterling silver chain. Standard length 16", if you'd like a different length get in touch.

image.alt: A small skull face on a chain in a black box which also contains a skull face on a small ring. The box sits on a pile of flower petals

mobile.alt: A small skull face on a chain in a black box which also contains a skull face on a small ring. The box sits on a pile of flower petals

thumbnail.alt: A small skull face on a chain in a black box which also contains a skull face on a small ring. The box sits on a pile of flower petals

description.text: These tiny skulls are carved and finished by hand, so each is unique. Cast in solid recycled silver, it is a dainty but heavy piece, strung on a recycled 925 chain in your choice of length.

image.alt: A small skull, with no lower jaw made from silver, with blackened details in the eye and nose sockets and teeth, on a silver chain.

mobile.alt: A small skull, with no lower jaw made from silver, with blackened details in the eye and nose sockets and teeth, on a silver chain.

thumbnail.alt: A small skull, with no lower jaw made from silver, with blackened details in the eye and nose sockets and teeth, on a silver chain.

description.text: Solid sterling hand carved silver bat ring - this item is a size I1/2-J so please measure before ordering! It's small but hefty so will need to be hallmarked before you receive it - so allow up to two weeks to receive this item. If you'd like one made in your size, contact me.

image.alt: A small silver ring where the centre front shows he body of a bag, with black carved textural details and a little face. It’s wings wrap around the band to the back of the ring.

mobile.alt: A small silver ring where the centre front shows he body of a bag, with black carved textural details and a little face. It’s wings wrap around the band to the back of the ring.

thumbnail.alt: A small silver ring where the centre front shows he body of a bag, with black carved textural details and a little face. It’s wings wrap around the band to the back of the ring.

description.text: This tiny moon charm is hand carved and made from solid sterling eco silver, featuring a little man in the moon face design.
Choose between a 16", 20" and 24" recycled sterling silver chain.

image.alt: A close up photo of a shiny silver crescent moon with a face in profile on a silver chain, laying on a flower petal.

mobile.alt: A close up photo of a shiny silver crescent moon with a face in profile on a silver chain, laying on a flower petal.

thumbnail.alt: A close up photo of a shiny silver crescent moon with a face in profile on a silver chain, laying on a flower petal.

description.text: Set of five unique TBH designs in vinyl sticker form.
These are splashproof stickers which are all approximately 5cm x 5cm

image.alt: A black envelope shows stickers spilling out. All black and white, with images of snakes, skeletons and flowers.

thumbnail.alt: A black envelope shows stickers spilling out. All black and white, with images of snakes, skeletons and flowers.

description.text: Temporary tattoo sheet from The Black Hart. With two sets of knuckle tattoos and an additional 11 designs you can be top to toe in Stick and Soak tattoos.

Cut the design you'd like from the sheet. Remove clear paper and place face down onto clean, dry skin. Using cold water on a sponge or flannel, press down on the tattoo for 30 seconds. Carefully remove backing paper and allow tattoo to dry.

image.alt: Two hands showing a temporary tattoo of a crying eye on one and a spiderweb on the other, with 'love hart' spelled out on the knuckles, on a floral black backdrop.

thumbnail.alt: Two hands showing a temporary tattoo of a crying eye on one and a spiderweb on the other, with 'love hart' spelled out on the knuckles, on a floral black backdrop.

image.alt: A white sheet with multiple illustrations in black with grey shading. Images of bats, flowers, a tooth, an eye, a cat, and an axe surround a larger illustration of a lit candle.

thumbnail.alt: A white sheet with multiple illustrations in black with grey shading. Images of bats, flowers, a tooth, an eye, a cat, and an axe surround a larger illustration of a lit candle.
